name: Amnesia Early Demo
description:
This is a early access demo on a new game called  Amnesia

We also like donationz

Please humbly and kindly give donations so we will stop idiots from deleting system32

#FORSYSTEM32

Glitches:

  • Grass Rats do 0 damage
  • The end of the demo is indicated by a inescapable wall
  • Some in game assets are unobtainable
